channel.description: Recent content in home on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers

item.title: Basic Commands
item.description: Table of Contents Home Chat Island/Cave Areas Grief Prevention Miscellaneous Commands Argument Required <> Required [] Optional Home These commands are affecting by your rank. For example a normal member gets only 1 home. See Ranks for more info! /sethome [name] [-o] Sets your home at a current location. Failure to specify a name will set the home under the name home.
